column4: Umm. Hi. Something weird just happened to me. I had around 150 mb free space on hda1, so I moved a 1,1 GB file to hda2, however, the when I run "df -h", the free space on hda1 hasn't increased o_O
and yes, I moved the file, not copied
the file was most likely still opened by a program - especially if it was a log file
it was a .zip file, but it shouldn't be opened anywhere...
